    ExcludeCultures barbarian, nomad, baltic, brittonic, dacian, germanic, iberian, illyrian, nuragic, greek, paeonian, thracian, etruscan, eastern, arab, caucasian, anatolian, indian, tamil, tibetan, tocharian, egyptian, nubian, carthaginian, numidian
    NoGoingBackLevel  1 
    AntiTraits RacesHaterRomanVice

    Level Race_Goer
        Description Race_Goer_desc
        EffectsDescription Race_Goer_effects_desc
        Threshold  2 

        Effect PopularStanding  5 

    Level Charioteer
        Description Charioteer_desc
        EffectsDescription Charioteer_effects_desc
        Threshold  4 

        Effect Electability -3 
        Effect PopularStanding  10 

    Level Fanatical_Chariot_Racer
        Description Fanatical_Chariot_Racer_desc
        EffectsDescription Fanatical_Chariot_Racer_effects_desc
        Threshold  6 

        Effect Management -1 
        Effect Electability -6 
        Effect PopularStanding  15

    Characters family
    ExcludeCultures barbarian, nomad, baltic, brittonic, dacian, germanic, iberian, illyrian, nuragic, greek, paeonian, thracian, etruscan, eastern, arab, caucasian, anatolian, indian, tamil, tibetan, tocharian, egyptian, nubian, carthaginian, numidian

;--------------------------------------------------
;------------ 2.2$ - Fears/Hates Traits -----------
;--------------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trait FearsNomad
    Characters family
    ExcludeCultures nomad
    AntiTraits HatesNomad

    Level Uncomfortable_Near_Nomads
        Description Uncomfortable_Near_Nomads_desc
        EffectsDescription Uncomfortable_Near_Nomads_effects_desc
        Threshold  1 

        Effect Combat_V_Nomad -1 

    Level Fears_Nomads
        Description Fears_Nomads_desc
        EffectsDescription Fears_Nomads_effects_desc
        Threshold  2 

        Effect Combat_V_Nomad -2 

    Level Terrified_by_Nomad_Ways
        Description Terrified_by_Nomad_Ways_desc
        EffectsDescription Terrified_by_Nomad_Ways_effects_desc
        GainMessage Terrified_by_Nomad_Ways_gain_desc
        Threshold  4 

        Effect Combat_V_Nomad -3 

;------------------------------------------
Trait HatesNomad
    Characters family
    ExcludeCultures nomad
    AntiTraits FearsNomad

    Level Despises_Nomad_Ways
        Description Despises_Nomad_Ways_desc
        EffectsDescription Despises_Nomad_Ways_effects_desc
        Threshold  1 

        Effect Combat_V_Nomad  1 

    Level Hates_Nomads
        Description Hates_Nomads_desc
        EffectsDescription Hates_Nomads_effects_desc
        Threshold  2 

        Effect Combat_V_Nomad  2 

    Level Loathes_Vile_Nomads
        Description Loathes_Vile_Nomads_desc
        EffectsDescription Loathes_Vile_Nomads_effects_desc
        Threshold  4 

        Effect Combat_V_Nomad  3

;-------------------------------------------------------------
;-------------------- 3$ Culture Traits ----------------------
;-------------------------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trait HasCulture
	Characters all
	Hidden
	NoGoingBackLevel  1

	Level HasCulture
		Description Empty_desc
		EffectsDescription Empty_effects_desc
		Threshold  1

;------------------------------------------
Trait IsItalic
	Characters all
	NoGoingBackLevel  1
	AntiTraits IsCeltic, IsPhoenician, IsGreek, IsEgyptian, IsIranian, IsScythian, IsAnatolian, IsArab, IsBaltic, IsBrittonic, IsCaucasian, IsDacian, IsDravidian, IsNubian, IsEtruscan, IsGermanic, IsIberian, IsIllyrian, IsIndian, IsNumidian, IsNuragic, IsPaeonian, IsThracian, IsTibetan, IsTocharian, IsAquitanian, IsArmenian, IsLusitanian, IsEthiopian, IsHunnic, IsRoman, IsSaka, IsAssyrian, IsMesopotamian, IsJudaean

	Level IsItalic
		Description IsItalic_desc
		EffectsDescription IsItalic_effects_desc
		Threshold  1

		Religious_Belief italic  1

	Characters all
	NoGoingBackLevel  1
	AntiTraits IsItalic, IsCeltic, IsPhoenician, IsGreek, IsEgyptian, IsIranian, IsScythian, IsAnatolian, IsArab, IsBaltic, IsBrittonic, IsDacian, IsDravidian, IsNubian, IsEtruscan, IsGermanic, IsIberian, IsIllyrian, IsIndian, IsNumidian, IsNuragic, IsPaeonian, IsThracian, IsTibetan, IsTocharian, IsAquitanian, IsArmenian, IsLusitanian, IsEthiopian, IsHunnic, IsRoman, IsSaka, IsAssyrian, IsMesopotamian, IsJudaean

	Level IsCaucasian
		Description IsCaucasian_desc
		EffectsDescription IsCaucasian_effects_desc
		Threshold  1

;===============================================================
;== TRIGGER DATA STARTS HERE ==
;===============================================================

;-------------------------------------------------------------
;------------------- 1# Vanilla Triggers ---------------------
;-------------------------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0010_Standard_Battle_Attacker_Crushing_Victory_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects GoodAttacker  2  Chance  100 
    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_V0010_Standard_Battle_Attacker_Crushing_Victory_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadAttacker = 0

    Affects GoodAttacker  2  Chance  100 
    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_CrushingVictory_lower_bad_attacker
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadAttacker > 0

    Affects BadAttacker  Lose  2  Chance  100 
    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0020_Standard_Battle_Attacker_Crushing_Loss_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects BadAttacker  2  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_V0020_Standard_Battle_Attacker_Crushing_Loss_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait GoodAttacker = 0

    Affects BadAttacker  2  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_CrushingLoss_lower_good_attacker
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait GoodAttacker > 0

    Affects GoodAttacker  Lose  2  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0030_Standard_Battle_Defender_Crushing_Victory_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects GoodDefender  2  Chance  100 
    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_V0030_Standard_Battle_Defender_Crushing_Victory_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadDefender = 0

    Affects GoodDefender  2  Chance  100 
    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_CrushingVictory_lower_bad_defender
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadDefender > 0

    Affects BadDefender  Lose  2  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0040_Standard_Battle_Defender_Crushing_Loss_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects BadDefender  2  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_V0040_Standard_Battle_Defender_Crushing_Loss_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait GoodDefender = 0

    Affects BadDefender  2  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_CrushingLoss_lower_good_defender
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait GoodDefender > 0

    Affects GoodDefender  Lose  2  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0050_Standard_Battle_Attacker_Clear_Victory_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = clear
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects GoodAttacker  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_V0050_Standard_Battle_Attacker_Clear_Victory_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = clear
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadAttacker = 0

    Affects GoodAttacker  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = clear
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadAttacker > 0

    Affects BadAttacker  Lose  1  Chance  100

          and BattleOdds < 3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0250_Worthy_Of_Adoption_1_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption


    Affects GoodCommander  3  Chance  33 
    Affects GoodAttacker  2  Chance  17 
    Affects GoodDefender  2  Chance  17 
    Affects GoodSiegeAttacker  2  Chance  17 
    Affects Brave  3  Chance  17 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0250a_Worthy_Of_Adoption_2_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption


    Affects Drink  1  Chance  8 
    Affects Sobriety  1  Chance  12 
    Affects Disciplinarian  2  Chance  17 
    Affects GoodAdministrator  6  Chance  17 
    Affects PlainRomanVirtue  1  Chance  17 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0250b_Worthy_Of_Adoption_3_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption


    Affects BattleScarred  1  Chance  17 
    Affects Loyal  1  Chance  17 
    Affects Intelligent  1  Chance  8 
    Affects NaturalMilitarySkill  1  Chance  8 
    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  80 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0260_Worthy_Of_Marriage_1_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage


    Affects GoodCommander  3  Chance  33 
    Affects GoodAttacker  2  Chance  17 
    Affects GoodDefender  2  Chance  17 
    Affects Brave  1  Chance  17 
    Affects PlainRomanVirtue  1  Chance  17

    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage


    Affects Drink  1  Chance  4 
    Affects Sobriety  1  Chance  12

    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage


    Affects BattleScarred  1  Chance  17 
    Affects Loyal  1  Chance  17 
    Affects Intelligent  1  Chance  8 
    Affects NaturalMilitarySkill  1  Chance  8 
    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger temple_of_fun_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_fun_temple

    Affects Drink  1  Chance  10 
    Affects Gambling  1  Chance  10 
    Affects Joker  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Girls  1  Chance  5 
    Affects Perverted  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger drink2_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= tavern

    Affects Drink  1  Chance  5 
    Affects Gambling  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and RandomPercent > 90

    Affects Drink  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Gambling  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Joker  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Girls  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_camo_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and RandomPercent > 60

    Affects Feck  1  Chance  1 
    Affects HaleAndHearty  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Scout  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger temple_of_love_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_love_temple

    Affects Girls  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_a_bit_drunk_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Drink >= 1
          and FatherTrait Drink <= 2

    Affects Sobriety  3  Chance  50 
    Affects PhlegmHumour  1  Chance  20 
    Affects Drink  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Drink >= 3
          and FatherTrait Drink <= 4

    Affects Sobriety  9  Chance  75 
    Affects BlackBileHumour  1  Chance  20 
    Affects Drink  1  Chance  30

          and FatherTrait Drink <= 6

    Affects Drink  1  Chance  30

    Affects Ignorance  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Miserly  1  Chance  3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger luxurious_lifestyle1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_love_awesome_temple

    Affects Aesthetic  1  Chance  5 
    Affects Epicurean  1  Chance  5 
    Affects ExpensiveTastes  1  Chance  5 
    Affects Gambling  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Girls  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger luxurious_lifestyle2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_trade_awesome_temple

    Affects Aesthetic  1  Chance  5 
    Affects Epicurean  1  Chance  5 
    Affects ExpensiveTastes  1  Chance  5 
    Affects Gambling  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Girls  1  Chance  3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger harsh_lifestyle1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = governors_house
          and RandomPercent > 50

    Affects Austere  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Ignorance  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Pragmatic  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Stoic  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger harsh_lifestyle2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and InBarbarianLands
          and RandomPercent > 90

    Affects Austere  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Ignorance  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Pragmatic  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Stoic  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger harsh_lifestyle3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 0
          and Attribute Management >= 3

    Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger education
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and Trait Ignorance < 1
          and Trait Insane <= 1
          and not RemasteredEducation

    Affects PhilosophySkill  1  Chance  1 
    Affects NaturalPhilosophySkill  1  Chance  1 
    Affects RhetoricSkill  1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodEngineer  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger education_remastered
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and Trait Ignorance < 1
          and Trait Insane <= 1
          and RemasteredEducation

    Affects PhilosophySkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects NaturalPhilosophySkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects RhetoricSkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects GoodEngineer  1  Chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger education2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and Trait Ignorance < 1
          and Trait Insane <= 1
          and not RemasteredEducation

    Affects PoeticSkill  1  Chance  1 
    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  1 
    Affects ArchitectSkill  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Stoic  1  Chance  1 
    Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and Trait Ignorance < 1
          and Trait Insane <= 1
          and RemasteredEducation

    Affects PoeticSkill  1  Chance  1 
    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects ArchitectSkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Stoic  1  Chance  1 
    Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects PhilosophySkill  1  Chance  2
    Affects NaturalPhilosophySkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects RhetoricSkill  1  Chance  2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger education3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Ignorance < 1
          and Trait Insane <= 1
          and SettlementBuildingExists = ludus_magnus
          and CultureType roman
          and not RemasteredEducation

    Affects BoringSpeaker  1  Chance  1 
    Affects MathematicsSkill  1  Chance  1 
    Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  1 
    Affects PhilosophySkill  1  Chance  1 
    Affects PoliticsSkill  1  Chance  1

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Ignorance < 1
          and Trait Insane <= 1
          and SettlementBuildingExists = ludus_magnus
          and CultureType roman
          and RemasteredEducation

    Affects BoringSpeaker  1  Chance  1 
    Affects MathematicsSkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  2
    Affects PhilosophySkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects PoliticsSkill  1  Chance  2

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Ignorance < 1
          and Trait Insane <= 1
          and SettlementBuildingExists = ludus_magnus
          and CultureType roman
          and RemasteredEducation

;------------------------------------------
Trigger goveror_not_building
    WhenToTest SettlementTurnEnd

    Condition GovernorInResidence
          and BuildingQueueIdleDespiteCash

    Affects BadBuilder  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger governor_building
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition GovernorInResidence

    Affects GoodBuilder  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_n_fear1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtCulture roman

    Affects HatesRoman  1  Chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_n_fear2
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtCulture greek

    Affects HatesGreek  1  Chance  40

Trigger failed_to_attack
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInEnemyZOC

    Affects IndecisiveAttacker  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.3

    Affects BattleScarred  1  Chance  30 
    Affects Brave  1  Chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle1b
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.3
          and Trait Berserker >= 1

    Affects Berserker  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle1R
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.3
          and CultureType roman

    Affects RomanHero  1  Chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle2
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 6

    Affects Brave  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle2R
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 6
          and CultureType roman

    Affects RomanHero  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 8

    Affects Brave  1  Chance  20 
    Affects Bloodthirsty  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3R
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 8
          and CultureType roman

    Affects RomanHero  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle4
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and PercentageEnemyKilled = 0
          and BattleOdds <= 1.2

    Affects Coward  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle5
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and CultureType roman

    Affects VictorRomanVirtue  1  Chance  100 
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  4 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and not CultureType roman

    Affects VictorOthersVirtue  1  Chance  100 
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle7
    WhenToTest BattleGeneralRouted


    Affects Coward  1  Chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger AedileFirstTime
    WhenToTest TakeOffice

    Condition HasOffice Aedile
    	   && Trait notAedile = 0

    Affects Aedile  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest TakeOffice

    Condition HasOffice Censor
    	   && Trait notCensor = 0

    Affects Censor  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest TakeOffice

    Condition HasOffice Consul
    	   && Trait notConsul = 0

    Affects Consul  1  Chance  100

    WhenToTest TakeOffice

    Condition HasOffice PontifexMaximus
    	   && Trait PontifexMaximus = 0

    Affects PontifexMaximus  1  Chance  100

    WhenToTest TakeOffice

    Condition HasOffice Praetor
    	   && Trait Praetor = 0

    Affects Praetor  1  Chance  100

    WhenToTest TakeOffice

    Condition HasOffice Quaestor
    	   && Trait Quaestor = 0

    Affects Quaestor  1  Chance  100

    WhenToTest LeaveOffice

    Condition HasOffice Aedile

    Affects notAedile  2  Chance  100

    WhenToTest LeaveOffice

    Condition HasOffice Censor

    Affects notCensor  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest LeaveOffice

    Condition HasOffice Consul

    Affects notConsul  2  Chance  100

    WhenToTest LeaveOffice

    Condition HasOffice PontifexMaximus

    Affects notPontifexMaximus  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest LeaveOffice

    Condition HasOffice Praetor

    Affects notPraetor  2  Chance  100

    WhenToTest LeaveOffice

    Condition HasOffice Quaestor

    Affects notQuaestor  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest TakeOffice

    Condition HasOffice Aedile
           && Trait notAedile >= 1

    Affects Aedile  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger CensorAgain
    WhenToTest TakeOffice

    Condition HasOffice Censor
           && Trait notCensor >= 1

    Affects Censor  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ConsulAgain
    WhenToTest TakeOffice

    Condition HasOffice Consul
           && Trait notConsul >= 1

    Affects Consul  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger PontifexMaxumusAgain
    WhenToTest TakeOffice

    Condition HasOffice PontifexMaximus
           && Trait notPontifexMaximus >= 1

    Affects PontifexMaximus  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger PraetorAgain
    WhenToTest TakeOffice

    Condition HasOffice Praetor
           && Trait notPraetor >= 1

    Affects Praetor  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger QuaestorAgain
    WhenToTest TakeOffice

    Condition HasOffice Quaestor
           && Trait notQuaestor >= 1

    Affects Quaestor  2  Chance  100

Trigger withdraws
    WhenToTest PreBattleWithdrawal

    Condition WasAttacker

    Affects IndecisiveAttacker  1  Chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsUnderSiege

    Affects Austere  1  Chance  20

    WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

    Condition not CultureType roman

    Affects VictorOthersVirtue  1  Chance  100

    Condition CultureType roman

    Condition not CultureType roman

    WhenToTest LeaderDestroyedFaction

    Condition CultureType roman

    Affects VictorRomanVirtue  10  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger disaster
    WhenToTest CharacterDamagedByDisaster

    Condition RandomPercent > 96

    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption


    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  50 
    Affects Sobriety  1  Chance  12 
    Affects Disciplinarian  2  Chance  17 
    Affects GoodAdministrator  6  Chance  31 
    Affects Intelligent  1  Chance  8 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption3
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption


    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  50 
    Affects Drink  1  Chance  8 
    Affects BattleScarred  1  Chance  17 
    Affects Loyal  1  Chance  17 
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  9 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger admiral1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition AgentType = admiral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 2.25

    Affects Sailor  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger admiral2
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition AgentType = admiral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleOdds > 1.5

    Affects Landlubber  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger corruption1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Treasury > 50000

    Affects Corrupt  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Aesthetic  1  Chance  3 
    Affects ExpensiveTastes  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Epicurean  1  Chance  3 
    Affects BadAdministrator  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger corruption2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Treasury > 100000

    Affects Corrupt  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Aesthetic  1  Chance  3 
    Affects ExpensiveTastes  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Epicurean  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Embezzler  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger corruption4
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Treasury > 150000

    Affects Corrupt  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Aesthetic  1  Chance  3 
    Affects ExpensiveTastes  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Epicurean  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Embezzler  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger corruption3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Treasury > 50000
          and CultureType roman

    Affects ApicianRomanVice  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Affects Factionleader  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger reinherited
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir
    Condition Trait Exheir = 1

    Affects Factionheir  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger disinherited
    WhenToTest CeasedFactionHeir
    Condition not Trait Exheir = 1
          and not IsFactionLeader

    Affects Exheir  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger inherited
    WhenToTest CeasedFactionHeir
    Condition IsFactionLeader

    Affects Exheir  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger becomesheir
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

    Affects Factionheir  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger demoted
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir
    Condition IsFactionLeader

    Affects Factionheir  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger games
    WhenToTest GovernorThrowGames


    Affects GamesFanRomanVice  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger races
    WhenToTest GovernorThrowRaces


    Affects RacesFanRomanVice  1  Chance  10

    WhenToTest AcquisitionMission

    Condition MissionSucceeded

    Affects GoodMerchant  1  Chance  100 
    Affects MerchantEnemies  1  Chance  25

    WhenToTest AcquisitionMission

    Condition not MissionSucceeded

    Affects BadMerchant  1  Chance  33

    WhenToTest SufferAcquisitionAttempt


    Affects SecureMerchant  1  Chance  50

          and TradingResource

    Condition AgentType = merchant

          and TradingResource
          and DistanceCapital >= 60

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = merchant
    and Trait SpiritualMilieuViking = 1
    and RegionTradingResource homewares
    and RegionTradingResource wine

    Affects SpiritualMilieuViking  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger templededication19
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = merchant
    and Trait SpiritualMilieuViking = 1
    and RegionTradingResource homewares

    Affects SpiritualMilieuViking  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger templededication19
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = merchant
    and Trait SpiritualMilieuViking = 1
    and RegionTradingResource wine

    Affects SpiritualMilieuViking  3  Chance  100 




;------------------------------------------
Trigger templededication20
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = merchant
          and HomeSettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_violence_shrine


    Affects SpiritualMilieuViolence  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger templededication20
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = merchant
    and Trait SpiritualMilieuViolence = 1
    and RegionTradingResource live_goods
    and RegionTradingResource homewares

    Affects SpiritualMilieuViolence  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger templededication20
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = merchant
    and Trait SpiritualMilieuViolence = 1
    and RegionTradingResource live_goods

    Affects SpiritualMilieuViolence  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger templededication20
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = merchant
    and Trait SpiritualMilieuViolence = 1
    and RegionTradingResource homewares

    Affects SpiritualMilieuViolence  3  Chance  100 











; STB 09-Jul-2020 Add new triggers
;------------------------------------------
Trigger diet_of_carrots_1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition Trait NightBattleCapable = 0
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command >= 4
          and NightBattlesEnabled

    Affects NightBattleCapable  6  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger diet_of_carrots_2
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command >= 1
          and IsNightBattle
          and Trait NightBattleCapable = 0
          and WonBattle
          and NightBattlesEnabled

    Affects NightBattleCapable  6  Chance  100 

; YHZ 02-Mar-2020 - Allow adding night traits to descr_strat.txt, and remove them outside of Remastered
;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_not_remastered
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition Trait NightBattleCapable = 1
          and not NightBattlesEnabled

    Affects NightBattleCapable  -1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_victory_attacker
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 2
          and IsNightBattle
          and NightBattlesEnabled

    Affects Noctophilia  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_victory_defender
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 2
          and IsNightBattle
          and NightBattlesEnabled

    Affects Noctophilia  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_loss_attacker
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and IsNightBattle
          and NightBattlesEnabled

    Affects Noctophobia  1  Chance  66 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_loss_defender
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and IsNightBattle
          and NightBattlesEnabled

    Affects Noctophobia  1  Chance  66








;-------------------------------------------------------------
;--------------------- 2# New Triggers -----------------------
;-------------------------------------------------------------

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;      NEW FAMILY-BASED TRIGGERS HERE      ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

;--------------------------------------------------
;------------- 2.1# - Family Triggers -------------
;--------------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger isClaudiaGens_inheritance
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait isClaudiaGens = 1

    Affects isClaudiaGens 1 Chance 100
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger isFabiaGens_inheritance
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait isFabiaGens = 1

    Affects isFabiaGens 1 Chance 100
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger isCorneliaGens_inheritance
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait isCorneliaGens = 1

    Affects isCorneliaGens 1 Chance 100
	
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait isValeriaGens = 1

    Affects isValeriaGens 1 Chance 100
	
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Affects isValeriaMessalla 1 Chance 100

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait isPostumiaGens = 1

    Affects isPostumiaGens 1 Chance 100






;--------------------------------------------------
;---------- 2.2# - Fears/Hates Triggers -----------
;--------------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dad_FearsNomad
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait FearsNomad >= 1 

    Affects HatesNomad  1  Chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dad_HatesNomad
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait HatesNomad >= 1 

    Affects HatesNomad  1  Chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_Nomad
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtCulture nomad

    Affects HatesNomad  1  Chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger fear_Nomad
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtCulture nomad
          and not CultureType nomad

    Affects FearsNomad  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dad_FearsBaltic
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait FearsBaltic >= 1

    Affects HatesBaltic  1  Chance  25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dad_HatesBaltic
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait HatesBaltic >= 1

    Affects HatesBaltic  1  Chance  25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_Baltic
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtCulture baltic

    Affects HatesBaltic  1  Chance  40

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtCulture baltic
          and not CultureType baltic

    Affects FearsBaltic  1  Chance  20

Trigger fear_Thracian
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtCulture thracian
          and not CultureType thracian

    Affects FearsThracian  1  Chance  20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dad_FearsEtruscan
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait FearsEtruscan >= 1

    Affects HatesEtruscan  1  Chance  25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dad_HatesEtruscan
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait HatesEtruscan >= 1

    Affects HatesEtruscan  1  Chance  25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_Etruscan
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtCulture etruscan

    Affects HatesEtruscan  1  Chance  40

;------------------------------------------
Trigger fear_Etruscan
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 1.5
          and GeneralFoughtCulture etruscan
          and not CultureType etruscan

    Affects FearsEtruscan  1  Chance  20
	
;------------------------------------------

;-------------------------------------------------------------
;------------------- 3# Culture Triggers ---------------------
;-------------------------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
;-------- IsItalic triggers --------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Italic_Assassin
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsItalic < 1
		  and CultureType roman
		  and not FactionType romans_julii
		  and not FactionType romans_scipii
		  and not FactionType romans_brutii
		  and not FactionType romans_senate

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsItalic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Italic_Diplomat
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsItalic < 1
		  and CultureType roman
		  and not FactionType romans_julii
		  and not FactionType romans_scipii
		  and not FactionType romans_brutii
		  and not FactionType romans_senate

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsItalic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Italic_Merchant
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsItalic < 1
		  and CultureType roman
		  and not FactionType romans_julii
		  and not FactionType romans_scipii
		  and not FactionType romans_brutii
		  and not FactionType romans_senate

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsItalic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Italic_Spy
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = spy
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsItalic < 1
		  and CultureType roman
		  and not FactionType romans_julii
		  and not FactionType romans_scipii
		  and not FactionType romans_brutii
		  and not FactionType romans_senate
		  

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsItalic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Dads_Italic
	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition FatherTrait IsItalic > 0

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsItalic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Adopt_Italic
	WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType roman
		and not FactionType slave
		and not FactionType romans_julii
		and not FactionType romans_scipii
		and not FactionType romans_brutii
		and not FactionType romans_senate

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsItalic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Lesser_Adopt_Italic
	WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType roman
		and not FactionType slave
		and not FactionType romans_julii
		and not FactionType romans_scipii
		and not FactionType romans_brutii
		and not FactionType romans_senate

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsItalic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Italic
	WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

	Condition CultureType roman
		and not FactionType slave
		and not FactionType romans_julii
		and not FactionType romans_scipii
		and not FactionType romans_brutii
		and not FactionType romans_senate

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsItalic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Convert_Italic
	WhenToTest AcceptBribe

	Condition CultureType roman
		and not FactionType slave
		and not FactionType romans_julii
		and not FactionType romans_scipii
		and not FactionType romans_brutii
		and not FactionType romans_senate
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsItalic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Italics1
	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition CultureType roman
		and not FactionType slave
		and not FactionType romans_julii
		and not FactionType romans_scipii
		and not FactionType romans_brutii
		and not FactionType romans_senate

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsItalic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Italics2
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition CultureType roman
		and not FactionType slave
		and not FactionType romans_julii
		and not FactionType romans_scipii
		and not FactionType romans_brutii
		and not FactionType romans_senate
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsItalic  1  Chance  100
	
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
;-------- IsCeltic triggers --------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Celtic_Assassin
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsCeltic < 1
		  and CultureType barbarian
		  and not FactionType tarbelli

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCeltic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Celtic_Diplomat
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsCeltic < 1
		  and CultureType barbarian
		  and not FactionType tarbelli

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCeltic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Celtic_Merchant
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsCeltic < 1
		  and CultureType barbarian
		  and not FactionType tarbelli

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCeltic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Celtic_Spy
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = spy
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsCeltic < 1
		  and CultureType barbarian
		  and not FactionType tarbelli

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCeltic  1  Chance  100

	Condition FatherTrait IsCeltic > 0

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCeltic  1  Chance  100

	Condition CultureType barbarian
		and not FactionType tarbelli

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCeltic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType barbarian
		and not FactionType tarbelli

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCeltic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

	Condition CultureType barbarian
		and not FactionType tarbelli

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCeltic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest AcceptBribe

	Condition CultureType barbarian
		and not FactionType tarbelli
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCeltic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition CultureType barbarian
		and not FactionType tarbelli

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCeltic  1  Chance  100

	Condition CultureType barbarian
		and not FactionType tarbelli
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCeltic  1  Chance  100

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsPhoenician < 1
		  and CultureType carthaginian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsPhoenician  1  Chance  100

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsPhoenician < 1
		  and CultureType carthaginian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsPhoenician  1  Chance  100

		  and Trait HasCulture < 1

Trigger Egyptian_Assassin
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsEgyptian < 1
		  and CultureType egyptian
		  and not FactionType kush

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsEgyptian  1  Chance  100

	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsEgyptian < 1
		  and CultureType egyptian
		  and not FactionType kush

Trigger Iranian_Assassin
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsIranian < 1
		  and CultureType eastern

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIranian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsIranian < 1
		  and CultureType eastern

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIranian  1  Chance  100

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsIranian < 1
		  and CultureType eastern

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIranian  1  Chance  100

		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsIranian < 1
		  and CultureType eastern

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIranian  1  Chance  100

	WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType eastern

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100

	WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

	Condition CultureType eastern

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100

		and Trait HasCulture < 1

;------------------------------------------
;-------- IsScythian triggers --------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Scythian_Assassin
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsScythian < 1
		  and CultureType nomad
		  and not FactionType huns
		  and not FactionType saka

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsScythian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Scythian_Diplomat
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsScythian < 1
		  and CultureType nomad
		  and not FactionType huns
		  and not FactionType saka

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsScythian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Scythian_Merchant
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsScythian < 1
		  and CultureType nomad
		  and not FactionType huns
		  and not FactionType saka

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsScythian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = spy
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsScythian < 1
		  and CultureType nomad
		  and not FactionType huns
		  and not FactionType saka

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsScythian  1  Chance  100

	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition FatherTrait IsScythian > 0

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsScythian  1  Chance  100

	Condition CultureType nomad
		and not FactionType huns
		and not FactionType saka

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsScythian  1  Chance  100

	Condition CultureType nomad
		and not FactionType huns
		and not FactionType saka

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsScythian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

	Condition CultureType nomad
		and not FactionType huns
		and not FactionType saka

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsScythian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest AcceptBribe

	Condition CultureType nomad
		and not FactionType huns
		and not FactionType saka
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsScythian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition CultureType nomad
		and not FactionType huns
		and not FactionType saka

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsScythian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition CultureType nomad
		and not FactionType huns
		and not FactionType saka
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsScythian  1  Chance  100

		  and CultureType anatolian

		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAnatolian  1  Chance  100

	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition CultureType anatolian
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAnatolian  1  Chance  100
	
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
;-------- IsArab triggers --------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Arab_Assassin
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsArab < 1
		  and CultureType arab

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArab  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Arab_Diplomat
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsArab < 1
		  and CultureType arab

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArab  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Arab_Merchant
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsArab < 1
		  and CultureType arab

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArab  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Arab_Spy
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = spy
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsArab < 1
		  and CultureType arab

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArab  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Dads_Arab
	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition FatherTrait IsArab > 0

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArab  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Adopt_Arab
	WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType arab

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArab  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Lesser_Adopt_Arab
	WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType arab

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArab  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Arab
	WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

	Condition CultureType arab

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArab  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Convert_Arab
	WhenToTest AcceptBribe

	Condition CultureType arab
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArab  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Arabs1
	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition CultureType arab

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArab  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Arabs2
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition CultureType arab
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArab  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
;-------- IsCaucasian triggers --------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Caucasian_Assassin
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsCaucasian < 1
		  and CultureType caucasian
		  and not FactionType armenia

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCaucasian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Caucasian_Diplomat
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsCaucasian < 1
		  and CultureType caucasian
		  and not FactionType armenia

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCaucasian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Caucasian_Merchant
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsCaucasian < 1
		  and CultureType caucasian
		  and not FactionType armenia

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCaucasian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Caucasian_Spy
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = spy
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsCaucasian < 1
		  and CultureType caucasian
		  and not FactionType armenia

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCaucasian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Dads_Caucasian
	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition FatherTrait IsCaucasian > 0

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCaucasian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Adopt_Caucasian
	WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType caucasian
		and not FactionType armenia

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCaucasian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Lesser_Adopt_Caucasian
	WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType caucasian
		and not FactionType armenia

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCaucasian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Caucasian
	WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

	Condition CultureType caucasian
		and not FactionType armenia

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCaucasian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Convert_Caucasian
	WhenToTest AcceptBribe

	Condition CultureType caucasian
		and not FactionType armenia
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCaucasian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition CultureType caucasian
		and not FactionType armenia

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsCaucasian  1  Chance  100

	Condition CultureType caucasian
		and not FactionType armenia
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

		  and not FactionType spain

		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsIberian < 1
		  and CultureType iberian
		  and not FactionType spain

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIberian  1  Chance  100

		  and Trait HasCulture < 1

		  and not FactionType spain

	Affects IsIberian  1  Chance  100

		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsIberian < 1
		  and CultureType iberian
		  and not FactionType spain

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIberian  1  Chance  100

Trigger Dads_Iberian
	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition FatherTrait IsIberian > 0

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIberian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Adopt_Iberian
	WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType iberian
		and not FactionType spain

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIberian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Lesser_Adopt_Iberian
	WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType iberian
		and not FactionType spain

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIberian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Iberian
	WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

	Condition CultureType iberian
		and not FactionType spain

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIberian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Convert_Iberian
	WhenToTest AcceptBribe

	Condition CultureType iberian
		and not FactionType spain
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIberian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Iberians1
	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition CultureType iberian
		and not FactionType spain

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIberian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Iberians2
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition CultureType iberian
		and not FactionType spain
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIberian  1  Chance  100
	
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
;-------- IsIllyrian triggers --------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Illyrian_Assassin
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsIllyrian < 1
		  and CultureType illyrian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIllyrian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Illyrian_Diplomat
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsIllyrian < 1
		  and CultureType illyrian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIllyrian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Illyrian_Merchant
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsIllyrian < 1
		  and CultureType illyrian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIllyrian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = spy
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsIllyrian < 1
		  and CultureType illyrian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIllyrian  1  Chance  100

	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition FatherTrait IsIllyrian > 0

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIllyrian  1  Chance  100

	WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType illyrian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIllyrian  1  Chance  100

	WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType illyrian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIllyrian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

	Condition CultureType illyrian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIllyrian  1  Chance  100

	WhenToTest AcceptBribe

	Condition CultureType illyrian
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIllyrian  1  Chance  100

	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition CultureType illyrian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIllyrian  1  Chance  100

		and Trait HasCulture < 1

;------------------------------------------
;-------- IsIndian triggers --------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Indian_Assassin
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsIndian < 1
		  and CultureType indian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIndian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Indian_Diplomat
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsIndian < 1
		  and CultureType indian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIndian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Indian_Merchant
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsIndian < 1
		  and CultureType indian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIndian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Indian_Spy
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = spy
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsIndian < 1
		  and CultureType indian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIndian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Dads_Indian
	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition FatherTrait IsIndian > 0

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIndian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Adopt_Indian
	WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType indian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIndian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Lesser_Adopt_Indian
	WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType indian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIndian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Indian
	WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

	Condition CultureType indian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIndian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Convert_Indian
	WhenToTest AcceptBribe

	Condition CultureType indian
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIndian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Indians1
	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition CultureType indian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIndian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Indians2
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition CultureType indian
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsIndian  1  Chance  100

Trigger Numidian_Assassin
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsNumidian < 1
		  and CultureType numidian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsNumidian  1  Chance  100

		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsNumidian < 1
		  and CultureType numidian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsNumidian  1  Chance  100

		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsNumidian < 1
		  and CultureType numidian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsNumidian  1  Chance  100

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100

	WhenToTest AcceptBribe

	Condition CultureType numidian
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

;------------------------------------------
;-------- IsAquitanian triggers --------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Aquitanian_Assassin
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsAquitanian < 1
		  and CultureType barbarian
		  and FactionType tarbelli

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAquitanian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Aquitanian_Diplomat
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsAquitanian < 1
		  and CultureType barbarian
		  and FactionType tarbelli

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAquitanian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsAquitanian < 1
		  and CultureType barbarian
		  and FactionType tarbelli

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAquitanian  1  Chance  100

	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = spy
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsAquitanian < 1
		  and CultureType barbarian
		  and FactionType tarbelli

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAquitanian  1  Chance  100

		and FactionType tarbelli

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAquitanian  1  Chance  100

	WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType barbarian
		and FactionType tarbelli

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAquitanian  1  Chance  100

	WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

	Condition CultureType barbarian
		and FactionType tarbelli

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAquitanian  1  Chance  100

	Condition CultureType barbarian

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAquitanian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
;-------- IsArmenian triggers --------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Armenian_Assassin
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsArmenian < 1
		  and CultureType caucasian
		  and FactionType armenia

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArmenian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Armenian_Diplomat
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsArmenian < 1
		  and CultureType caucasian
		  and FactionType armenia

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArmenian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Armenian_Merchant
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsArmenian < 1
		  and CultureType caucasian
		  and FactionType armenia

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArmenian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Armenian_Spy
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = spy
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsArmenian < 1
		  and CultureType caucasian
		  and FactionType armenia

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArmenian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Dads_Armenian
	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition FatherTrait IsArmenian > 0

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArmenian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Adopt_Armenian
	WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType caucasian
		and FactionType armenia

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArmenian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Lesser_Adopt_Armenian
	WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType caucasian
		and FactionType armenia

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArmenian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Armenian
	WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

	Condition CultureType caucasian
		and FactionType armenia

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArmenian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Convert_Armenian
	WhenToTest AcceptBribe

	Condition CultureType caucasian
		and FactionType armenia
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArmenian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Armenians1
	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition CultureType caucasian
		and FactionType armenia

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArmenian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Armenians2
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition CultureType caucasian
		and FactionType armenia
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsArmenian  1  Chance  100
	
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
;-------- IsLusitanian triggers --------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Lusitanian_Assassin
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsLusitanian < 1
		  and CultureType iberian
		  and FactionType spain

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsLusitanian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Lusitanian_Diplomat
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsLusitanian < 1
		  and CultureType iberian
		  and FactionType spain

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsLusitanian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Lusitanian_Merchant
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsLusitanian < 1
		  and CultureType iberian
		  and FactionType spain

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsLusitanian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Lusitanian_Spy
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = spy
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsLusitanian < 1
		  and CultureType iberian
		  and FactionType spain

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsLusitanian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition FatherTrait IsLusitanian > 0

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsLusitanian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Adopt_Lusitanian
	WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType iberian
		and FactionType spain

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsLusitanian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Lesser_Adopt_Lusitanian
	WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType iberian
		and FactionType spain

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsLusitanian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Lusitanian
	WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

	Condition CultureType iberian
		and FactionType spain

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsLusitanian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Convert_Lusitanian
	WhenToTest AcceptBribe

	Condition CultureType iberian
		and FactionType spain
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsLusitanian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Lusitanians1
	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition CultureType iberian
		and FactionType spain

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsLusitanian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Lusitanians2
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition CultureType iberian
		and FactionType spain
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsLusitanian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
;-------- IsEthiopian triggers --------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Ethiopian_Assassin
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsEthiopian < 1
		  and CultureType nubian
		  and FactionType axum

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsEthiopian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Ethiopian_Diplomat
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsEthiopian < 1
		  and CultureType nubian
		  and FactionType axum

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsEthiopian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Ethiopian_Merchant
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsEthiopian < 1
		  and CultureType nubian
		  and FactionType axum

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsEthiopian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = spy
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsEthiopian < 1
		  and CultureType nubian
		  and FactionType axum

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsEthiopian  1  Chance  100

	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition FatherTrait IsEthiopian > 0

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsEthiopian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType nubian
		and FactionType axum

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsEthiopian  1  Chance  100

	WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType nubian
		and FactionType axum

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsEthiopian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

	Condition CultureType nubian
		and FactionType axum

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsEthiopian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------

	WhenToTest AcceptBribe

	Condition CultureType nubian
		and FactionType axum
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsEthiopian  1  Chance  100

	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition CultureType nubian
		and FactionType axum

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsEthiopian  1  Chance  100

	Affects IsEthiopian  1  Chance  100

;-------- IsHunnic triggers --------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Hunnic_Assassin
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsHunnic < 1
		  and CultureType nomad
		  and FactionType huns

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsHunnic  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Hunnic_Diplomat
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsHunnic < 1
		  and CultureType nomad
		  and FactionType huns

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsHunnic  1  Chance  100

	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsHunnic < 1
		  and CultureType nomad
		  and FactionType huns

	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsSaka < 1
		  and CultureType nomad
		  and FactionType saka

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsSaka  1  Chance  100

		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsSaka < 1
		  and CultureType nomad
		  and FactionType saka

		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
