;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
;-------- IsRoman triggers (Julii) --------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Roman_Assassin
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsRoman < 1
		  and CultureType roman
		  and (
				FactionType romans_julii
				or FactionType romans_brutii
				or FactionType romans_scipii
				or FactionType romans_senate
			)

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsRoman  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Roman_Diplomat
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsRoman < 1
		  and CultureType roman
		  and (
				FactionType romans_julii
				or FactionType romans_brutii
				or FactionType romans_scipii
				or FactionType romans_senate
			)

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsRoman  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Roman_Merchant
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsRoman < 1
		  and CultureType roman
		  and (
				FactionType romans_julii
				or FactionType romans_brutii
				or FactionType romans_scipii
				or FactionType romans_senate
			)

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsRoman  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Roman_Spy
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = spy
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsRoman < 1
		  and CultureType roman
		  and (
				FactionType romans_julii
				or FactionType romans_brutii
				or FactionType romans_scipii
				or FactionType romans_senate
			)

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsRoman  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Dads_Roman
	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition FatherTrait IsRoman > 0

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsRoman  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Adopt_Roman
	WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType roman
		and (
				FactionType romans_julii
				or FactionType romans_brutii
				or FactionType romans_scipii
				or FactionType romans_senate
			)

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsRoman  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Lesser_Adopt_Roman
	WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

	Condition CultureType roman
		and (
				FactionType romans_julii
				or FactionType romans_brutii
				or FactionType romans_scipii
				or FactionType romans_senate
			)

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsRoman  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Roman
	WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

	Condition CultureType roman
		and (
				FactionType romans_julii
				or FactionType romans_brutii
				or FactionType romans_scipii
				or FactionType romans_senate
			)

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsRoman  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Convert_Roman
	WhenToTest AcceptBribe

	Condition CultureType roman
		and (
				FactionType romans_julii
				or FactionType romans_brutii
				or FactionType romans_scipii
				or FactionType romans_senate
			)
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsRoman  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Romans1
	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition CultureType roman
		and (
				FactionType romans_julii
				or FactionType romans_brutii
				or FactionType romans_scipii
				or FactionType romans_senate
			)

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsRoman  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Romans2
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition CultureType roman
		and (
				FactionType romans_julii
				or FactionType romans_brutii
				or FactionType romans_scipii
				or FactionType romans_senate
			)
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsRoman  1  Chance  100
	
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
;-------- IsAssyrian triggers (Julii) --------
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assyrian_Assassin
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = assassin
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsAssyrian < 1
		  and FactionType palmyra

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAssyrian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assyrian_Diplomat
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = diplomat
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsAssyrian < 1
		  and FactionType palmyra

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAssyrian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assyrian_Merchant
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = merchant
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsAssyrian < 1
		  and FactionType palmyra

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAssyrian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Assyrian_Spy
	WhenToTest AgentCreated

	Condition AgentType = spy
		  and Trait HasCulture < 1
		  and Trait IsAssyrian < 1
		  and FactionType palmyra

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAssyrian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Dads_Assyrian
	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition FatherTrait IsAssyrian > 0

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAssyrian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Adopt_Assyrian
	WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

	Condition FactionType palmyra

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAssyrian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Lesser_Adopt_Assyrian
	WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

	Condition FactionType palmyra

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAssyrian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Marriage_Assyrian
	WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

	Condition FactionType palmyra

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAssyrian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Convert_Assyrian
	WhenToTest AcceptBribe

	Condition FactionType palmyra
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAssyrian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Assyrians1
	WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

	Condition FactionType palmyra

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAssyrian  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Safety_Assyrians2
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

	Condition FactionType palmyra
		and Trait HasCulture < 1

	Affects HasCulture 1 Chance 100
	Affects IsAssyrian  1  Chance  100
	
;------------------------------------------

;
;		IMPORTANT. NO TRIGGERS FOR MESOPOTAMIAN, JUDAEAN YET
;
;
;
